trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Configuration" /> namespace contains classes that provide configuration for applications and services built using the Windows Identity Foundation (WIF).
trans-unit.target: Lo spazio dei nomi <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Configuration" /> contiene classi che forniscono la configurazione per applicazioni e i servizi compilati tramite Windows Identity Foundation (WIF).

trans-unit.source: The classes in this namespace represent settings under the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Le classi in questo spazio dei nomi rappresentano le impostazioni nell'elemento [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md).

trans-unit.source: Classes that configure federation using the WS-Federation protocol are contained primarily in the <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che consentono di configurare la federazione mediante il protocollo WS-Federation sono contenute principalmente nello spazio dei nomi <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration" /> .

trans-unit.source: These settings appear under the [<system.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md) element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Queste impostazioni vengono visualizzate nell'elemento [<system.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md) in un file di configurazione.
